name: CMMS Codespace
postCreateCommand: sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get install -y ca-certificates curl && sudo install -m 0755 -d /etc/apt/keyrings && sudo curl -fsSL https://download.docker.com/linux/ubuntu/gpg -o /etc/apt/keyrings/docker.asc && sudo chmod a+r /etc/apt/keyrings/docker.asc && echo "deb [arch=$(dpkg --print-architecture) signed-by=/etc/apt/keyrings/docker.asc] https://download.docker.com/linux/ubuntu $(. /etc/os-release && echo $VERSION_CODENAME) stable" | sudo tee /etc/apt/sources.list.d/docker.list > /dev/null && sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get install -y docker-ce docker-ce-cli containerd.io docker-buildx-plugin docker-compose-plugin && sudo service docker start && sudo ln -s /usr/libexec/docker/cli-plugins/docker-compose /usr/local/bin/docker-compose && sudo usermod -aG docker vscode && newgrp docker && docker-compose up -d
